extendPosition(address,uint256,uint8,uin.details: No number for the leverage is given but the amount in the vault must be bigger than MIN_MARGIN_AT_CREATIONNo checks are done if bought amount exceeds allowance

params.amount: to be sold, in vQuote (if long) or vBase (if short)

getExpectedVBaseAmount(uint256).details: It's up to the client to apply a reduction of this amount (e.g. -1%) to then use it as `minAmount` in `extendPosition`

getExpectedVQuoteAmount(uint256).details: It's up to the client to apply a reduction of this amount (e.g. -1%) to then use it as `minAmount` in `extendPosition`

params.wadAmount: amount of vQuote provided with 1e18 precision

params.account: Trader account to close position for.
params.minAmount: Minimum amount that the user is willing to accept, in vQuote if LONG, in vBase if SHORT. 18 decimals
params.proposedAmount: Amount of tokens to be sold, in vBase if LONG, in vQuote if SHORT. 18 decimals

params.amount: of liquidity to be removed from the pool (with 18 decimals)

params.minAmount: Minimum amount that the user is willing to accept, in vQuote if LONG, in vBase if SHORT. 18 decimals
params.proposedAmount: Amount of tokens to be sold, in vBase if LONG, in vQuote if SHORT. 18 decimals

PRBMathSD59x18__AbsInputTooSmall().notice: Emitted when the input is MIN_SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__DivInputTooSmall().notice: Emitted when one of the inputs is MIN_SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__DivOverflow(uint256).notice: Emitted when one of the intermediary unsigned results overflows SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__MulInputTooSmall().notice: Emitted when one of the inputs is MIN_SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__MulOverflow(uint256).notice: Emitted when the intermediary absolute result overflows SD59x18.

PRBMath__MulDivFixedPointOverflow(uint25.notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

PRBMath__MulDivOverflow(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

extendPosition(address,uint256,uint8,uin.notice: Open or increase a position, either long or short

getBaseDust().notice: TODO: find a way to withdraw the dust

getExpectedVBaseAmount(uint256).notice: Return amount for vBase one would receive for exchanging `vQuoteAmountToSpend` (excluding slippage)

getExpectedVQuoteAmount(uint256).notice: Return amount for vQuote one would receive for exchanging `vBaseAmountToSpend` (excluding slippage)

indexPrice().notice: Return the current off-chain exchange rate for vBase/vQuote

marketPrice().notice: Return the last traded price (used for TWAP)

removeLiquidity(address,uint256).notice: Remove liquidity from the pool (but don't close LP position and withdraw amount)

settleAndWithdrawLiquidity(address,uint2.notice: Remove liquidity from the pool (but don't close LP position and withdraw amount).A LP wishing to cash out from his position entirely should first call `removeLiquidity` then `settleAndWithdrawLiquidity`Separated from `removeLiquidity` because `proposedAmount` (for SHORT like positions) can't guessed at the moment when user calls `removeLiquidity`
